content:
I started working on the Chomsky hierarchy.
At this point, the only thing that makes sense to review is this definition (ignore the rest of the file):
https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/blob/8b23dca4c747c8189c7afcb08ce37edb73b63e6e/Mathlib/Computability/Chomsky.lean#L22
Is Mathlib OK with having Finset.univ.val.map and Multiset.join.toList in production code?

Some changes have been made.
https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/16311
Can I get a preliminary approval of the definition before I proceed to prove the remaining lemmas?
